remarks: Version of ~ mo2 with a context and a distinctor replacing a distinct variable condition.  This version should be used only to eliminate dv conditions.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 11-Aug-2019.)
statement:
wl-mo2dnae.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
wl-mo2dnae.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
wl-mo2dnae.3 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. x x = y ) $.
wl-mo2dnae.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ps ) $.
wl-mo2dnae $p |- ( ph -> ( E* x ps <-> E. y A. x ( ps -> x = y ) ) ) $.
